content: What popular television show, set in a post-apocalyptic world, is based on the comic book series by Robert Kirkman?

The television show you're referring to is "The Walking Dead." It's based on the comic book series of the same name created by Robert Kirkman, Tony Moore, and Charlie Adlard. The show premiered on October 31, 2010, and has become one of the most popular and longest-running television series in the United States. It follows a group of survivors as they navigate a world overrun by zombies, known as "walkers," in search of safety and community.
